comment: Ok i was feeling really crappy over the way that Johnny has been treated throughout this whole mess as it was, but now I'm mad as all hell. What makes these AH fans think that posting that kind of vile crap for the world to see is ok? It's like they don't care that what they've posted doesn't just affect Johnny, but also his friends, his family, & (most importantly) his kids. No matter what AH's fans may feel about Johnny, they should have at least had the basic human decency not to say the evil things that they did, especially not on a platform where they knew that Johnny's kids would most likely come across it, or find out about it through their friends. Johnny's kids have done nothing whatsoever to deserve the distress & worry caused by what these heartless aholes have said about their dad. If it was their parents that were being treated like this then it wouldn't be so funny to them, nor would any of these cowards dare to say any of that crap they've posted to Johnny's face. These people make me sick.
